projects.name: Weather Forecasting App
projects.description: We create a weather app using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript codes. In this Weather app, you enter the citys name or country and it tells the weather of that area. We also add one more function that tells the weather of that area. In weather app used APIs to retrieve weather data for all cities and countries.

projects.name: Tour and Travel Landing Home Page
projects.description: I have created a tour and travel landing page in which we can choose the place according to us and at minimum cost and we have also created a contact form in location through which you can make an enquiry.
